text:
Hi Alex, I have a seed of an idea to build a reddit clone that uses ipfs or some similar p2p storage to reduce infrastructure costs. 

I think we may end up with a lot of data over time, and would need to figure out how to implement search, spam filtering and similar. 

Any interest in chatting about this?

elements.text:
